title: update.json should auto-convert string criteria to object format
description: When processing update.json, if acceptanceCriteria contains strings instead of {text, checked} objects, auto-convert them. This prevents format mismatch that breaks ralph-status and live updates.

acceptanceCriteria.text: In _ralph_apply_update_queue(), detect if criteria are strings
Auto-convert string criteria to {text: string, checked: false} format
ralph-status shows correct criteria count after conversion
Live progress bar updates work with converted criteria
Add test case in tests/test-ralph.zsh for criteria conversion
